text: Antoni Martí Petit (30 July 1963 – 6 November 2023) was an Andorran architect and politician. Andorra: Tax, foreign investment in the heart of early parliamentary Pisqa, 3 April 2011 He was the Prime Minister from 11 May 2011 to 16 May 2019. Martí died on 6 November 2023, at a hospital in Meritxell, Andorra from cardiac arrest at the age of 60.Mor Toni Martí ==References== Category:1963 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Prime ministers of Andorra
title: Antoni Martí
